body: Hello, I'm unable to turn off the psychometric chart mesh and only preview the graph axis elements. Can you tell me why, when I turn off the "preview", the colored mesh doesn't disappear? I've also attached my file.  Thanks in advance,[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/8u9*hkKvZQTj-j-aE3zG3GYC5710FrtCNQFH6Yz2zUUyYQWabl802jDghUl8TVEAuymCm2jiAiq0iLXMiiII*Se5zeX5pG4N/Capture.JPG)
topic: Psychometric Chart Preview "off" not hiding mesh
